name: 鄭妍方
objective:
本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。 
     二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。 
     三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。 
     四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。 
     五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。
本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。

scorePolicy:
Assignments of the course will total 90%, while in-class performance (e.g. being attentive in discussion) and attendance count for 10%. Due dates for assignments are listed on the course calendar and described in detail in class. All assignments, except for in-class writing tasks, should be typed. The list of assignments is as follows:
1) Resume or CV: 10%
2) Presentation #1: 20%
3) In-class writing (argument task): 10%
4) In-class writing (issue task): 10%
5) CV/Resume: 10%
6) Summary of a journal article or report: 10%
7) Final presentation: 20% 
8) Attendance and participation in class activity: 10%
